For **San Diego's** Viewing Party, we booked out an entire **Dave & Buster's** arcade with free food, drinks, and arcade games! If you live in the San Diego area, check out our event page at: [**bit.ly/ProjectSD**](http://bit.ly/ProjectSD)

{{champion:105}} _Go Tritons!_
FREE FOOD AND DRINK AND GAME CREDIT? i'm so down holy crap that sounds so dank
you have to get tickets, but this is still a great idea.
Why would I watch people play games when I can be busy PLAYING games at Dave & Buster?
Why not utilize movie theaters to simulcast games?  Their digital projectors and sound system and comfy chairs would be a spectator's paradise!

Hi everyone.  I live in Sacramento, CA and in trying to get pointed in the right direction to CREATE a viewing party of Worlds at a bar. I'll set up the details, but I need guidance in finding out how ppl would be interested in creating this event near me. Any advice to creating threads or ones already created would be appreciated and helpful. Thanks!
